channel.title: nespressoguide on Gianluca Fiore
channel.description: Recent content in nespressoguide on Gianluca Fiore

item.title: Buy Gianluca Coffee
item.description: Why I love coffee: It clearly tastes good It is a source of energy No start of the day is right without a proper coffee I love my Nespresso machine but the capsules are expensive Fuels my projects (quite literally) It’s like a donation to a friend (well, sort of) I love it that much that I keep a blog with a few friends about it (pod-specific coffee only though). You should check it out.
